docToken.name: decimalPlacesParameter
docToken.param: A value indicating the precision of the converted value.

docToken.name: decimalPlacesParameterFraction
docToken.param: Indicates the precision of the converted value. This parameter specifies the denominator of the fraction (1: 1/2, 2: 1/4, 3: 1/8, etc.).

docToken.name: zeroHandlingParameter
docToken.param: A value indicating how the leading and trailing zeroes are to be handled.
